text: Permanganate is an ion that contains one manganese ion in an oxidation state of +7 and 4 oxide atoms. It is a strong oxidizing agent. Permanganates are purple-black. Permanganates stain because they are easily reduced to brown- black manganese dioxide. ==Examples== *Potassium permanganate ==Related pages== *Chromate, a similar ion *Manganese *Manganese dioxide ==Sources== Category:Manganese compounds Category:Oxyanions
title: Permanganate
